original_text: So Moses made a bronze snake and put it up on a pole. Then when anyone was bitten by a snake and looked at the bronze snake, they lived.
korean_text: 모세가 놋뱀을 만들어 장대 위에 다니 뱀에게 물린 자가 놋뱀을 쳐다본즉 모두 살더라

sentences.original_text: So Moses made a bronze snake
and put it up on a pole.
Then when anyone was bitten by a snake
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후 어떤 사람이 뱀에게 물렸을 때

sentences.original_text: and looked at the bronze snake,
